Law clerk, Hon. Albert W. Coffrin, U.S. District Court, District of Vermont, 1980-1981
Private practice, New York City, 1981-1984
Private practice, Burlington, Vermont, 1984-2002
Judge, Vermont Superior Court, 2002-2013
Associate justice, Vermont Supreme Court, 2013-2014
